jobDescription: Clinical Lab Scientist (CLS/MLT/MT) 13-week Travel Job  We have an immediate interim full-time position available for a Clinical Lab Scientist with 2+ years’ experience and a willingness to tackle the night shift. With the day-time availability you have the option to explore the spectacular city of Los Angeles, CA. Experience the recreational activities such as, spectacular beaches and hundreds of miles of hiking and biking trails, or decompress at one of L.A.’s top spas. All the while working along-side a company who takes pride in our steadiness and efficiency to guide you through the entire process.  If this is an ideal opportunity for you I would love to be the best resource possible in connecting you with your next fun-filled summer assignment. If you meet the following requirements and look forward to this exciting experience or have questions about any of our assignments nationwide, feel free to e-mail me or give me a call with my contact information listed below. Qualifications:2+ years recent experienceBLS CertifiedActive CertificationsEmployment Type & Industry:Hospital Setting13-week contractNight ShiftResponsibilities:Preparing cultures of tissue samplesEstablishing and monitoring programs that ensure data accuracyCross-matching blood for transfusionsAnalyzing lab reports for accuracyOperating and calibrating equipmentDelivering test results to physicians, researchers or patientsCollecting and studying blood samples to determine morphologyBenefits:Competitive Compensation PackageContact Information: Susanna Garner  E-mail: Susanna.Garner@Soliant.com  Direct phone number: (281) 668-0648  www.Soliant.com
